an6.66:1.1: “Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an6.66:1.3: Thinaṁ, middhaṁ, uddhaccaṁ, kukkuccaṁ, assaddhiyaṁ, pamādaṁ—
an6.66:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an6.66:2.1: Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an6.66:2.3: Thinaṁ, middhaṁ, uddhaccaṁ, kukkuccaṁ, assaddhiyaṁ, pamādaṁ—
an6.66:2.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātun”ti.
